tagline: Converting handwritten and printed forms into structured data using AI
description: Formalogix specializes in automated form recognition and data extraction from handwritten and printed documents. Our hybrid AI approach combines machine learning with human verification to achieve 99.8% accuracy in 24-48 hours.

services.name: Self-Service API
services.description: Direct API integration for developers to process forms programmatically
features: Support for PDF, JPG, PNG formats

services.name: Full-Service Document Processing
services.description: End-to-end solution including scanning, processing, and human verification

services.name: Enterprise Solutions
services.description: Tailored solutions with ERP integration, custom workflows, and on-premise options

documentTypes: Educational exam papers and registration forms
Wholesale order forms and delivery notes

steps.name: Document Upload

steps.name: AI Processing
steps.description: Our AI extracts all text, checkboxes, and structured data

steps.description: Trained staff verify low-confidence fields and ensure accuracy

steps.description: Random sampling and quality checks to maintain 99.8% accuracy

steps.name: Data Delivery
steps.description: Structured data delivered via API, webhook, or download

commonQuestions.question: How accurate is Formalogix?
commonQuestions.answer: We guarantee 99.8% accuracy through our hybrid approach combining AI with human verification. This is significantly higher than pure OCR software (85-95% for handwriting).

commonQuestions.question: How long does processing take?
commonQuestions.answer: Standard processing is 24-48 hours. Self-Service API can provide results in real-time for simple forms, or within hours for complex handwritten documents. Enterprise clients can get custom SLAs.

commonQuestions.question: Is my data secure?
commonQuestions.answer: Yes. All data is processed in Germany (EU), GDPR compliant, with end-to-end encryption. We're ISO 27001 certified and offer data processing agreements (DPA/AVV). Enterprise clients can opt for on-premise deployment.

commonQuestions.question: What file formats do you accept?
commonQuestions.answer: We accept PDF, JPG/JPEG, PNG, and TIFF files via API or upload. Full-Service clients can also send physical documents which we scan professionally.

commonQuestions.question: Can you handle my specific form type?
commonQuestions.answer: Most likely yes. We process forms for insurance, healthcare, education, wholesale, and government sectors. Send us a sample to info@formalogix.com and we'll provide a free test evaluation within 24 hours.

commonQuestions.question: How much does it cost?
commonQuestions.answer: Pricing starts at €0.10 per page for Self-Service API and €0.35 per page for Full-Service. Volume discounts available for 10,000+ pages per month. No setup fees or minimum commitment for Self-Service.

commonQuestions.question: Do you offer a free trial?
commonQuestions.answer: Yes! You can process up to 10 pages for free to test the quality. Contact us at info@formalogix.com to start your trial.

commonQuestions.question: Can you integrate with our existing systems?
commonQuestions.answer: Yes. We offer RESTful API, webhooks, and can integrate with major ERP systems (SAP, Dynamics, Salesforce) or custom systems. Enterprise plans include dedicated integration support.

howToGetStarted.details: Email info@formalogix.com with your use case and sample form (optional)
We'll discuss your requirements and demonstrate how Formalogix works (within 24 hours)
Process up to 10 pages free to test accuracy and integration
Start processing - API access in minutes, Full-Service in 1-2 weeks, Enterprise in 2-4 weeks
